00019 void DeadLayerCalibratorEDepend::Calibrate(DrawObjContainer *c)
00020 {
00021    string strChId("  ");
00022 
00023    // Now calibrate individual active channels
00024    ChannelSetConstIter iCh;
00025    ChannelSetConstIter iChB = gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.begin();
00026    ChannelSetConstIter iChE = gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.end();
00027 
00028    for (iCh=iChB; iCh!=iChE; ++iCh)
00029    {
00030       // Skip if channel is disabled
00031       if (gMeasInfo->IsDisabledChannel(*iCh)) continue;
00032 
00033       sprintf(&strChId[0], "%02d", *iCh);
00034 
00035       TH1* hTimeVsE    = (TH1*) c->d["preproc"]->o["hTimeVsEnergyA_ch"+strChId];
00036       TH1* hMeanTime   = (TH1*) c->d["preproc"]->o["hFitMeanTimeVsEnergyA_ch"+strChId];
00037       TH1* hChi2Ndf    = (TH1*) c->d["preproc"]->o["hFitChi2NdfVsEnergyA_ch"+strChId];
00038       TH1* hChi2NdfLog = (TH1*) c->d["preproc"]->o["hFitChi2NdfLogVsEnergyA_ch"+strChId];
00039 
00040       TObjArray fitResultHists;
00041 
00042       // Single histogram calibration is done here
00043       CalibrateChannel(*iCh, hTimeVsE, hMeanTime, &fitResultHists); // extract also fitResultHists
00044 
00045       TH1* hChi2Ndf_tmp    = (TH1*) fitResultHists.At(3);
00046       TH1* hChi2NdfLog_tmp = (TH1*) fitResultHists.At(4);
00047 
00048       if (!hChi2Ndf_tmp) continue;
00049 
00050       for (Int_t ib=1; ib<=hChi2Ndf_tmp->GetNbinsX(); ++ib)
00051       {
00052          Float_t chi2 = hChi2Ndf_tmp->GetBinContent(ib);
00053          hChi2Ndf->SetBinContent(ib, chi2);
00054 
00055          Float_t logChi2 = hChi2NdfLog_tmp->GetBinContent(ib);
00056          hChi2NdfLog->SetBinContent(ib, logChi2 );
00057       }
00058 
00059       hChi2Ndf->GetListOfFunctions()->AddAll((TList*) hChi2Ndf_tmp->GetListOfFunctions()->Clone());
00060       hChi2Ndf->GetListOfFunctions()->SetOwner(kTRUE);
00061 
00062       hChi2NdfLog->GetListOfFunctions()->AddAll((TList*) hChi2NdfLog_tmp->GetListOfFunctions()->Clone());
00063       hChi2NdfLog->GetListOfFunctions()->SetOwner(kTRUE);
00064    }
00065 
00066    // The fitting of all channels is over. Calculate the Mean values
00067    Calibrator::UpdateMeanChannel();
00068 
00069    ChannelCalib const& chCalibMean       = GetMeanChannel();
00070    ChannelCalib const& chCalibMeanOfLogs = GetMeanOfLogsChannel();
00071 
00072    // Check for bad fits to avoid interference with the channel disabling
00073    // procedure. Also exclude channels which are not in line with the Mean
00074    // chi2
00075    ChannelCalibMapIter iChCalib = fChannelCalibs.begin();
00076 
00077    for ( ; iChCalib != fChannelCalibs.end(); ++iChCalib)
00078    {
00079       UShort_t chId = iChCalib->first;   
00080       ChannelCalib &chCalib = iChCalib->second;
00081       Double_t chChi2NdfLog = TMath::Log(chCalib.GetBananaChi2Ndf());
00082 
00083       // skip the first "channel" chId=0 with the sum
00084       if (chId == 0) continue;
00085 
00086       if ( chCalib.GetFitStatus() != kDLFIT_OK ) {
00087          gMeasInfo->DisableChannel(chId);
00088          continue;
00089       }
00090 
00091       // if this t0 is 2*RMS far from mean t0
00092       if ( TMath::Abs(chCalib.fT0Coef - chCalibMean.fT0Coef) > 3.0*chCalibMean.fT0CoefErr)
00093       {
00094          gMeasInfo->DisableChannel(chId);
00095          chCalib.fFitStatus = kT0_OUTLIER;
00096          continue;
00097       }
00098 
00099       if ( TMath::Abs(chCalib.fDLWidth - chCalibMean.fDLWidth) > 3.0*chCalibMean.fDLWidthErr)
00100       {
00101          gMeasInfo->DisableChannel(chId);
00102          chCalib.fFitStatus = kDL_OUTLIER;
00103          continue;
00104       }
00105 
00106       if ( chChi2NdfLog > 0 && 
00107            chChi2NdfLog > chCalibMeanOfLogs.GetBananaChi2Ndf() + 5.0*GetRMSOfLogsBananaChi2Ndf() )
00108       {
00109          gMeasInfo->DisableChannel(chId);
00110          chCalib.fFitStatus = kCHI2_OUTLIER;
00111          continue;
00112       }
00113    }
00114 
00115 }

00119 void DeadLayerCalibratorEDepend::CalibrateChannel(UShort_t chId, TH1 *hTimeVsE, TH1 *hMeanTime, TObjArray* fitResultHists, Bool_t wideLimits)
00120 {
00121    ChannelCalib *chCalib;
00122 
00123    ChannelCalibMap::iterator iChCalib = fChannelCalibs.find(chId);
00124 
00125    if ( iChCalib != fChannelCalibs.end() ) {
00126       chCalib = &iChCalib->second;
00127    } else {
00128       ChannelCalib ch;
00129       fChannelCalibs[chId] = ch;
00130       chCalib = &fChannelCalibs[chId];
00131    }
00132 
00133    if (!hTimeVsE || !hMeanTime) {
00134       Error("Calibrate", "Histogram (i.e. Time vs Energy) for channel %2d does not exist", chId);
00135       return;
00136    }
00137 
00138    if (hTimeVsE->Integral() < 2000) {
00139       Error("Calibrate", "Too few entries (Integral = %f) in histogram %s. Skipping calibration", hTimeVsE->Integral(), hTimeVsE->GetName());
00140       return;
00141    }
00142 
00143    Double_t xmin = hTimeVsE->GetXaxis()->GetXmin();
00144    Double_t xmax = hTimeVsE->GetXaxis()->GetXmax();
00145 
00146    ((TH2S*) hTimeVsE)->FitSlicesY(0, 0, -1, 0, "QNR", fitResultHists);
00147 
00148    // Reject points based on chi2
00149    TH1* hchi2       = (TH1*) fitResultHists->At(3);
00150    TH1* hchi2Log    = (TH1*) hchi2->Clone("hchi2Log");
00151    TH1* hchi2_profy = new TH1F("p", "p", 20, hchi2Log->GetMinimum(), hchi2Log->GetMaximum());
00152 
00153    fitResultHists->Add(hchi2Log);   
00154 
00155    TF1* logFunc = new TF1("logFunc", "TMath::Log(x)", 0, 1e10);
00156    utils::Apply(hchi2Log, logFunc);
00157    utils::ConvertToProfile(hchi2Log, hchi2_profy, kFALSE);
00158 
00159    Double_t hchi2_profy_mean = hchi2_profy->GetMean() <= 0 ? 0 : hchi2_profy->GetMean();
00160    Double_t hchi2_profy_rms  = hchi2_profy->GetRMS(); // was: use only half of the RMS
00161 
00162    delete logFunc;
00163    delete hchi2_profy;
00164 
00165    TLine* lineMean = new TLine(xmin, hchi2_profy_mean, xmax, hchi2_profy_mean);
00166    lineMean->SetLineWidth(2);
00167    lineMean->SetLineColor(kGreen);
00168 
00169    TLine* lineRMS  = new TLine(xmin, hchi2_profy_mean+hchi2_profy_rms, xmax, hchi2_profy_mean+hchi2_profy_rms);
00170    lineRMS->SetLineWidth(2);
00171    lineRMS->SetLineColor(kMagenta);
00172 
00173    hchi2Log->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(lineMean);
00174    hchi2Log->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(lineRMS);
00175    hchi2Log->GetListOfFunctions()->SetOwner(kTRUE);
00176 
00177    TH1* hmeans  = (TH1D*) fitResultHists->At(1);
00178 
00179    for (Int_t ib=1; ib<=hmeans->GetNbinsX(); ++ib)
00180    {
00181       Double_t chi2  = hchi2Log->GetBinContent(ib);
00182 
00183       // skip points with bad chi2
00184       if ( chi2 > hchi2_profy_mean + hchi2_profy_rms ) continue;
00185 
00186       Double_t bcont = hmeans->GetBinContent(ib);
00187       Double_t berr  = hmeans->GetBinError(ib);
00188 
00189       hMeanTime->SetBinContent(ib, bcont);
00190       hMeanTime->SetBinError(ib, berr);
00191    }
00192 
00193    Double_t frac = utils::GetNonEmptyFraction(hMeanTime);
00194    printf("Non empty bin fraction: %f\n", frac);
00195    
00196    if (frac < 0.50) {
00197       Error("Calibrate", "Too many bad slice fits in histogram %s. Skipping DL-T0 calibration", hMeanTime->GetName());
00198       gMeasInfo->DisableChannel(chId);
00199       return;
00200    }
00201 
00202    if (hMeanTime->GetEntries() <= 0) {
00203       Error("Calibrate", "Zero entries in histogram %s. Skipping DL-T0 calibration", hMeanTime->GetName());
00204       return;
00205    }
00206 
00207    BananaFitFunctor *bff = new BananaFitFunctor(chId);
00208 
00209    TF1 *bananaFitFunc = new TF1("bananaFitFunc", bff, xmin, xmax, 2, "BananaFitFunctor");
00210 
00211    bananaFitFunc->SetNpx(1000);
00212 
00213    // Set expected values and limits
00214    float meanT0  = 0;
00215    float meanDLW = 60;
00216 
00217    if ( fChannelCalibs[0].GetFitStatus() == kDLFIT_OK ) {
00218       meanT0  = fChannelCalibs[0].fT0Coef;
00219       meanDLW = fChannelCalibs[0].fDLWidth;
00220    }
00221 
00222    Float_t meanT0_low   = -30;
00223    Float_t meanT0_high  =  30;
00224    Float_t meanDLW_low  = 0;
00225    Float_t meanDLW_high = 200;
00226 
00227    bananaFitFunc->SetParameters(meanT0, meanDLW);
00228    bananaFitFunc->SetParNames("t_{0}, ns", "DL, #mug/cm^{2}");
00229 
00230    bananaFitFunc->SetParLimits(0, meanT0_low,  meanT0_high);
00231    bananaFitFunc->SetParLimits(1, meanDLW_low, meanDLW_high);
00232 
00233    printf("\n");
00234    Info("Calibrate", "Fitting histogram...");
00235 
00236    hMeanTime->Print();
00237 
00238    TFitResultPtr fitres = hMeanTime->Fit(bananaFitFunc, "E S R", "");
00239 
00240    delete bananaFitFunc;
00241 
00242    if (fitres.Get()) {
00243 
00244       // If something is wrong with the channel mark it accordingly
00245       if (fitres->FitResult::Status() != 0) {
00246          chCalib->fFitStatus = kDLFIT_FAIL;
00247          return;
00248       }
00249 
00250       chCalib->fBananaChi2Ndf = fitres->Ndf() > 0 ? fitres->Chi2()/fitres->Ndf() : -1;
00251 
00252       chCalib->fFitStatus     = kDLFIT_OK;
00253       chCalib->fT0Coef        = fitres->Value(0);
00254       chCalib->fT0CoefErr     = fitres->FitResult::Error(0);
00255       chCalib->fDLWidth       = fitres->Value(1);
00256       chCalib->fDLWidthErr    = fitres->FitResult::Error(1);
00257 
00258       // The following numbers come from run 9 (and probably earlier) analysis,
00259       // namely macro/KinFit.C
00260       chCalib->fAvrgEMiss     = 0.235 + 1.1013 * chCalib->fDLWidth +
00261                                 0.0075 * chCalib->fDLWidth * chCalib->fDLWidth;
00262       chCalib->fEMeasDLCorr   = 1.0098 + 0.0036 * chCalib->fDLWidth;
00263 
00264    } else {
00265       Error("Calibrate", "Empty TFitResultPtr");
00266       chCalib->fFitStatus = kDLFIT_FAIL;
00267    }
00268 }

00271 RunConst DeadLayerCalibratorEDepend::sRunConst  = RunConst();
00272 map<UShort_t, RunConst> DeadLayerCalibratorEDepend::sRunConsts = gRunConsts;
00273 
00274 const Double_t BananaFitFunctor::cp0[4] = {-0.5174     ,  0.4172     ,  0.3610E-02 , -0.1286E-05};
00275 const Double_t BananaFitFunctor::cp1[4] = { 1.0000     ,  0.8703E-02 ,  0.1252E-04 ,  0.6948E-07};
00276 const Double_t BananaFitFunctor::cp2[4] = { 0.2990E-05 , -0.7937E-05 , -0.2219E-07 , -0.2877E-09};
00277 const Double_t BananaFitFunctor::cp3[4] = {-0.8258E-08 ,  0.4031E-08 ,  0.9673E-12 ,  0.3661E-12};
00278 const Double_t BananaFitFunctor::cp4[4] = { 0.3652E-11 , -0.8652E-12 ,  0.4059E-14 , -0.1294E-15};
00279 
00280 
00281 BananaFitFunctor::BananaFitFunctor(UShort_t chId)
00282 {
00283    fRunConst = gRunConsts[chId];
00284 }
00285 
00286 
00288 Double_t BananaFitFunctor::operator()(double *x, double *p)
00289 {
00290    Double_t pp[5];
00291    Double_t x0 = x[0];
00292    Double_t x2 = x0*x0;
00293 
00294    Double_t p1 = TMath::Abs(p[1]);
00295    Double_t p2 = p1*p1;
00296    Double_t p3 = p1*p1*p1;
00297 
00298    pp[0] = cp0[0] + cp0[1]*p1 + cp0[2]*p2 + cp0[3]*p3;
00299    pp[1] = cp1[0] + cp1[1]*p1 + cp1[2]*p2 + cp1[3]*p3;
00300    pp[2] = cp2[0] + cp2[1]*p1 + cp2[2]*p2 + cp2[3]*p3;
00301    pp[3] = cp3[0] + cp3[1]*p1 + cp3[2]*p2 + cp3[3]*p3;
00302    pp[4] = cp4[0] + cp4[1]*p1 + cp4[2]*p2 + cp4[3]*p3;
00303 
00304    Double_t Ekin = pp[0] + pp[1]*x0 + pp[2]*x2 + pp[3]*x2*x0 + pp[4]*x2*x2;
00305 
00306    Double_t t_meas = (Ekin != 0.0) ?  fRunConst.E2T/sqrt(Ekin) - p[0] : 0.0;
00307 
00308    return t_meas;
00309 }
